headline: A Look At News Corp (NWSA) Valuation After Authorizing US$1b Share Buyback
summary: News (NWSA) is back in focus after the company authorized up to US$1b in share repurchases, a capital return move that can reshape per share metrics and influence how investors assess the stock. See our latest analysis for News. The share repurchase news comes at a time when News’ share price, at US$23.58, has a 1-day share price return of 1.73% and a 7-day share price return of 0.98%. However, it also has a 30-day share price return decline of 12.34% and a year-to-date share price return...

headline: Out-of-Town Shoppers Now Drive Demand in 87 of the Largest U.S. Markets, Realtor.com® Reports
summary: Cross-market home shopping continued to dominate the U.S. housing landscape in the final quarter of 2025. According to a new report from Realtor.com®, out-of-market shoppers accounted for 61.9% of online views for homes in the 100 largest metros, which is a significant shift from the 48.6% seen in the pre-pandemic era of 2019. While this search activity is down modestly from last year's 64.7% peak, the long-term trend highlights a more mobile and interconnected pool of home shoppers.
